data.content: There you are! We need to get out of here!
Liv! I know! Stop messing around, we have to go.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (He must have been from my class earlier... Kind of creepy that he remembers my name... )

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (Either way, he seems to be the only other person in here... I better stay on his good side)
Have you seen this art? Isn't it great! You can really tell how the artist is feeling!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Erm... I'm not much of an art connoisseur...
You have to see! I feel like I can hear the artist speak to me when I look at them!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (Why did then only other person around have to be this weirdo)
